content: for mom socks image mc barnyard knits pastel sunrise cc coates & co fiber maroon florals collection with mother s day just around the corner i wanted to design something special with a mother s love in mind the for mom sock does just that we start with a provisional cast on to allow for a double-layered cuff this reminds me of my mom s really good hugs i added some seed stitches to represent all those little seeds of wisdom our moms plant in our lives and i ve chosen colors that i know my mom will love i hope you take this and make it your own and if it earns you a few extra brownie points with mom you re welcome materials fingering weight yarn gauge 36 sts = 4 in textured pattern knit in o mc 300-350 yds the round and blocked o cc 40 yds 2 sets of us 1 2 25mm needles or size to size adult s m l obtain gauge foot measurements crochet hook small 7 circumference waste yarn medium 8 circumference tapestry needle large 9 circumference optional measuring tape 1 ©2023 tree purl mc main color pm place marker cc contrasting color sl slip st st s stitch es sm slip marker rs right side ssk slip slip knit k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together pattern cuff with mc co 56 64 72 sts using provisional cast on join for working in the round taking care not to twist the stitches link to provisional cast on video video demo of tip for joining in the round using magic loop knit 12 15 18 rounds even or until you ve reached your desired cuff width this will be the inside of your cuff sample shown is 15 rounds ~1 5 purl the next round knit even the same number of rounds as you previously knitted prior to the purl round slide another set of needles through the live stitches on to the provisional cast on and undo the provisional cast on fold at the purl round rs facing out hold both needles together in the left hand with the back needle holding the stitches that had been on the provisional cast on and the front needle holding the most recent knit round insert your right needle in the first stitch on the front left needle and then into the first stitch on the back needle knit these 2 sts together repeat until you have knit together all stitches off the front and back needles and now have a total of 56 64 72 sts leg round 1 *k4 p1 k1 p1 k1 *repeat from * to end round 2 *k1 p1 k2 p3 k1 *repeat from * to end repeat rounds 1&2 until you ve reached your desired
